name: The Frankenzlab
description:
For 2 to 5 players, one player is the alien creature trapped in a lab and trying to eat in peace, while the others are the scientists who want to mutate it for the lulz science!

The alien is controlled with a controller, while the scientists fire their guns with their keys of choice on the keyboard.

An extra keyboard is recommended for larger numbers of players.

Team:

Stefano Belloli

Jesualdo Garcia

Praveen Namasivayam

Georg Satyros
